snippet.title: LEGO Batman 3 - Rainbow DLC Pack (Free Roam Gameplay - Rainbow Batman & Rainbow Raider)
snippet.description:
Rainbow DLC pack including free roam gameplay with Rainbow Batman and Rainbow Raider in LEGO Batman 3: Beyond Gotham.  This DLC pack is free to download now for all consoles except the Wii U and includes two new playable characters.  Below are my playlists for LEGO Batman 3 on the PS4 and Playstation Vita.

This channel features instructional & highly edited video game guides, walkthroughs, speedruns and other uniquely transformative videos.  My own personal gameplay, extensive editing and creative input are clearly added into each video, ensuring that all videos adhere to YouTube's partner program guidelines.  My walkthoughs take tremendous amounts of work & editing so that all videos are straight to the point & can be used as professional video game guides.  All gameplay is my own & is recorded and edited solely by me.  Permission to upload each game was provided by the game publisher.

LEGO Batman 3 (PS4/Xbox One) Walkthrough Playlist:
https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLYpDU5ElRBfk7LV1a5sLgbhsMvu8QL1dn

LEGO Batman 3 (Vita/3DS) Playlist:
https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLYpDU5ElRBfnjvX8t1KZITkXN4sgeWHW3

00:03 - Rainbow Batman
00:35 - Rainbow Raider
